imdb.plot outline: America's Leader in Outdoor TV will pair up two larger-than-life outdoor personalities that will compete in a high-definition clash of styles, egos and opposing qualities. Beretta's Wild and Raw will take the best-selling author, patriot and warrior Marcus Luttrell, and compare and contrast his hunting skills and techniques with multiple world shooting champion Scott Robertson. This character-driven reality program promises to showcase the competitive nature of both men with adrenaline-pumping results.
imdb.title: Wild and Raw
plot: America's Leader in Outdoor TV will pair up two larger-than-life outdoor personalities that will compete in a high-definition clash of styles, egos and opposing qualities. Beretta's _Wild and Raw_ (qv) will take the best-selling author, patriot and warrior Marcus Luttrell, and compare and contrast his hunting skills and techniques with multiple world shooting champion Scott Robertson. This character-driven reality program promises to showcase the competitive nature of both men with adrenaline-pumping results.::The Outdoor Channel
